decision_conditions:
The wording of Condition 2 attached to planning permission P2019/2266/S73 dated 23/01/2020 should now read as:

CONDITION: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:

The following documents are approved by Planning Permission P2015/3050/FUL:
Planning Statement (ref: LNBI/CSH/01), Design and Access Statement, Heritage Statement, Arboricultural Impact Assessment (ref: 02342R), Drainage Planning Statement (Ellis and Moore), Air Quality Assessment (ref: J0039/1/F1, Noise Assessment (dated 16th July 2015), Transport Statement (dated July 2015), Energy Strategy (ref: G6/K150022), Utilities Statement (ref: G6/K150022), Draft Green performance Plan (ref: G6/K150022), Daylight Sunlight Report (dated 19th May 2015), Updated Daylight Sunlight Report (Dated 18th August 2015),
472 PA 001, 472 PA 002 Rev A, 472 PA 003, 472 PA 004, 472 PA 005, 472 PA 006, 472 PA 007, 472 PA 010, 472 PA 011, 472 PA 012, 472 PA 013, 472 PA 014 Rev A, 472 PA 015, 472 PA 016 Rev A, 472 PA 017 Rev A, 472 PA 018, 472 PA 020 Rev A, 472 PA 021 Rev A, 472 PA 022 Rev A, 472 PA 023, 472 PA 024 Rev A, 472 PA 025 Rev A, 472 PA 026 Rev A, 472 PA 027 Rev A, 472 PA 028 Rev A, 472 PA 029 472 PA 030 and 472 PA 032.

The following additional documents are approved by Planning Permission P2019/2266/S73:
Cover Letter prepared by McBains (dated 04/09/2019), Unit Types Schedule prepared by McBains (dated 04/09/2019), Design Statement prepared by McBains (dated July 2019), 472 PA 001, P1020-MCB-XX-00-DR-A-0020 S2 Rev P5, P1020-MCB-XX-XX-VS-A-0001-S2- P2, P1020-MCB-XX-ZZ-DR-A-0031 A1 Rev CR, P1020-MCB-XX-ZZ-DR-A-0032 A1 Rev C1, P1020-MCB-XX-ZZ-DR-A-0033 A1 Rev C1, P1020-MCB-XX-ZZ-DR-A-0034 A1 Rev C1, P1020-MCB-XX-ZZ-DR-A-0035 A1 Rev C1, P1020-MCB-XX-ZZ-DR-A-0036 A1 Rev C1 and P1020-MCB-XX-ZZ-DR-A-3105.

REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Act 1990 as amended and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
description: Application for Non-Material Amendment to planning permission: P2019/2266/FUL dated 23/01/2020. The amendment seeks the addition of 2x downwater drainage pipes from a canopy at ground floor level to the Lloyd Baker Street elevation.
